price: (Abͻfoͻ no) kaa sε: “Ennsuro, Yε de abarimaa nimdefoͻ bi ho bͻhyε rebrε wo“.
arabic: قَالُواْ لَا تَوۡجَلۡ إِنَّا نُبَشِّرُكَ بِغُلَٰمٍ عَلِيمٖ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qālū lā tawjal innā nubashiruka bighulāmin ʿalīmin
